/* LOGIN 검증 */ SELECT grp.mgr_grp_id , grp.mgr_grp_nm , mgr.mgr_id , mgr.mgr_nm , mgr.sys_mgr_stat_cd , rol.apit_dtm , rol.expr_dtm FROM (SELECT in_mgr.mgr_id , in_mgr.mgr_nm , in_mgr.sys_mgr_stat_cd FROM practice.sys_mgr in_mgr WHERE in_mgr.mgr_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND in_mgr.mgr_pw = #{userPw, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND in_mgr.sys_mgr_stat_cd IN (SELECT cd_val FROM practice.sys_comm_cd_bs bs INNER JOIN practice.sys_comm_cd_dt dt ON bs.comm_cd_id = dt.comm_cd_id WHERE bs.use_yn = 'Y' AND dt.use_yn = 'Y' AND dt.comm_cd_id = 'SYS_MGR_STAT_CD' AND dt.addt_cd_val = 'Y') ) mgr INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_role rol ON mgr.mgr_id = rol.mgr_id INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_grp grp ON rol.mgr_grp_id = grp.mgr_grp_id WHERE rol.apit_dtm <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND rol.expr_dtm > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND rol.use_yn = 'Y' AND grp.use_yn = 'Y'
AND grp.mgr_grp_id = #{mgrGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
